[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md) &gt; [getGlyph](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.getglyph.md)

## FontCatalog.getGlyph() method

Retrieves the loaded \[\[GlyphData\]\] for a specific character. Returns `undefined` if the assets for this glyph haven't been loaded yet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGlyph(codePoint: number, font: Font, fontStyle: FontStyle): GlyphData | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  codePoint | number | Character's Unicode code point. |
|  font | [Font](./harp-text-canvas.font.md) | \[\[Font\]\] to get this glyph from. |
|  fontStyle | [FontStyle](./harp-text-canvas.fontstyle.md) | Specific \[\[FontStyle\]\] to get glyphs for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md) \| undefined

\[\[GlyphData\]\] for this code point.
